hanzi-su-wiki:
約

Значения

Приблизительно; обещать, договариваться, сокращать; сокращать, экономить; сокращать, соглашение, вязывать себя, клятва

Мнемоника

  • Клятвенное соглашение, сдерживающее аппетиты обеих сторон, как бы держа их ложки 勺 на привязи 糸.

  • "Отрежьте приблизительную длину нитки 糸."

Варианты

约
purpleculture_pinyin:
yuē
to make an appointment; to invite; approximately; pact; treaty; to economize; to restrict; to reduce (a fraction); concise
чтобы назначить встречу; пригласить; примерно; пакт; договор; экономить; ограничить; уменьшить (дробь); лаконичный

yāo
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
взвешивать на весах или на весах
rtega_mnemonic:

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 约)
Pictophonetic: 寸 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
約束 [ yuē shù ]: to restrict; to limit to; to constrain; restriction; constraint
約塔 [ yāo tǎ ]: iota (Greek letter Ιι)
約維克 [ yāo wéi kè ]: Gjøvik (city in Oppland, Norway)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 勺 [ sháo ] spoon, ladle; unit of volume
heisig_chinese_memo: Anytime Spiderman breaks a promise after he make an appointment, Aunt Mae hits him one over with her ladle.
heisig_story: Consider for a moment the etymology of the word "promise" in order to notice its roots in the activity of putting one thing (e.g., one's word of honor) in place of another (e.g., the fulfillment of a task). For as it turns out, this character also means "to abridge, economize, and abbreviate" - all activities that involve putting one thing in place of another. With that in mind, we may now work with the elements: thread . . . ladle.
koohiiStory1: He tied a thread around the ladle as a reminder of his promise to do more house work.
koohiiStory2: Spiderman promised to get Aunt Mae´s ladle back. He started to do a blood oath by spilling drops of blood but Aunt Mae stopped him and bound up the wound. "It´s only a ladle Peter".
jp_example_words:
規約(きやく): agreement, rules, code
倹約(けんやく): thrift, economy, frugality
条約(じょうやく): treaty, pact
制約(せいやく): limitation, restriction, condition, constraints
契約(けいやく): contract, compact, agreement
婚約(こんやく): engagement, betrothal
節約(せつやく): economising, saving
約(やく): approximately, about, some
約束(やくそく): promise
予約(よやく): reservation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You tie a thread on your finger before jumping in the pool to remind yourself of the promise you made to your mother. The thread represents the promise you made to mow the lawn after you finished swimming in the pool.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The promise reminding thread on your finger was tied too tight. You can feel the thread starting to cut off your circulation as your finger starts to turn purple and go numb. It’s really uncomfortable.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After you get out of the pool, you keep the promise you made to your mother. So you get on your yak (やく) powered mower and trim the grass. Yes, your mower is pulled by a yak. It’s very efficient.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself sitting on a riding mower as you’re pulled around the yard by a yak. The yak is having a hard time pulling you so its making lots of yak noises. Hear them in your mind.
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 勹 (обёртка), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
yuē: (глаг/нареч) договариваться, назначать встречу; приглашать; около, примерно
yuē: (графема) сдерживать; соглашение; встреча; краткий, сжатый; скромный, бережливый; (матем.) сокращать (дробь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you will ladle (勺) the thread (糸), you promise
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey's Aunt May smacks him with a ladle, 'Make an appointment with the doctor like I told you!'
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Shito " and " Spoon ", the original meaning is entanglement and ring bundle. "Shuowen": "Twisted beams. From Shito, the sound of spoons." "Poetry·Xiaoya·Sigan": "Yuezhige Pavilion, Bingzhiluo." Mao Chuan: "Yue, Shuye."

" About " can mean a rope. "The Eleventh Year of Zuo Zhuan-Ai Gong": "People seek appointments, Wu has short hair." Du's note: "Years, ropes. Eight feet is seeking."

" Contract " can also mean restraint and check. "The Analects of Confucius-Yong Ye": "A gentleman is versed in literature, and he makes an appointment with courtesy."

" About " can also mean obstruction. "Warring States Policy-Yan Policy II": "Qin called King Yan, King Yan wanted to go. King Su Daiyue Yan... King Yan Zhao couldn't do it."

" About " can also mean reduction and simplicity. "Grandson: Virtual Reality": "If you can fight against the widows with the crowd, then I will have an appointment with the warriors." Du Mu's note: "Agreement, there are still few."

" About " can mean simple. "Guanzi·Huangong Questions": "Everything is easy to follow by appointment, but it is easy to meet if you want to be few."

" About " also refers to invitation. "Mencius·Guo Zixia": "I can make an appointment for the king and the country, and fight against it."

" About " also refers to estimation. Tang Bai Juyi "Self-titled Xiaocao Ting": "The amount of green glutinous rice can be consumed in a cup, and the red rice is about to rise in cooking."

" About " also refers to approximately. "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Hua Tuo Biography": "Sit down in front of the sick, and see the snake generation in Beibi County of Tuo, about ten."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Shito " and " Spoon ", the original meaning is entanglement and ring bundle.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「勺」聲，本義為纏束、環束。《說文》：「纏束也。从糸，勺聲。」 《詩‧小雅‧斯干》：「約之閣閣，椓之橐橐。」毛傳：「約，束也。」

　　「約」可表示繩子。《左傳‧哀公十一年》：「人尋約，吳髮短。」杜預注：「約，繩也。八尺為尋。」

　　「約」也可表示約束、檢束。《論語‧雍也》：「君子博學於文，約之以禮。」

　　「約」還可表示攔阻。《戰國策‧燕策二》：「秦召燕王，燕王欲往。蘇代約燕王……燕昭王不行。」

　　「約」亦可表示省減、簡約。《孫子‧虛實》：「能以眾擊寡者，則吾之所與戰者約矣。」杜牧注：「約，猶少也。」

　　「約」可指簡單。《管子‧桓公問》：「事約而易從，求寡而易足。」

　　「約」也指邀請。《孟子‧告子下》：「我能為君約與國，戰必克。」

　　「約」還指估量。唐白居易〈自題小草亭〉：「綠醅量盞飲，紅稻約升炊。」

　　「約」亦指大約。《三國志‧魏志‧華佗傳》：「疾者前入坐，見佗北壁縣此蛇輩，約以十數。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「勺」聲，本義為纏束、環束。

①繩子。
②拘束，限制：約束。約法。制約。約定俗成。
③共同議定的要遵守的條款：立約。條約。契約。
④事先說定：約見。約會。
⑤邀請：約請。約集。
⑥節儉：節約。儉約。
⑦簡要，簡單：由博返約。簡約。
⑧大略：約計。約莫。約略。
⑨算術上指用公因數去除分子和分母使分數簡化：約分。

For as it turns out, this character also means "to abridge, economize, and abbreviate" - all activities that involve putting one thing in place of another. With that in mind, we may now work with the elements: thread . . . ladle.

從「 糸 」，「 勺 」聲，本義為纏束、環束。《說文》：「纏束也。从糸，勺聲。」 《詩‧小雅‧斯干》：「約之閣閣，椓之橐橐。」毛傳：「約，束也。」 「 約 」可表示繩子。《左傳‧哀公十一年》：「人尋約，吳髮短。」杜預注：「約，繩也。八尺為尋。」 「 約 」也可表示約束、檢束。《論語‧雍也》：「君子博學於文，約之以禮。」 「 約 」還可表示攔阻。《戰國策‧燕策二》：「秦召燕王，燕王欲往。蘇代約燕王……燕昭王不行。」 「 約 」亦可表示省減、簡約。《孫子‧虛實》：「能以眾擊寡者，則吾之所與戰者約矣。」杜牧注：「約，猶少也。」 「 約 」可指簡單。《管子‧桓公問》：「事約而易從，求寡而易足。」 「 約 」也指邀請。《孟子‧告子下》：「我能為君約與國，戰必克。」 「 約 」還指估量。唐白居易〈自題小草亭〉：「綠醅量盞飲，紅稻約升炊。」 「 約 」亦指大約。《三國志‧魏志‧華佗傳》：「疾者前入坐，見佗北壁縣此蛇輩，約以十數。」
From the sound of " Shito" and " Spoon", the original meaning is entanglement and ring bundle. "Shuowen": "Twisted beams. From Shito, the sound of spoons." "Poetry·Xiaoya·Sigan": "Yuezhige Pavilion, Bingzhiluo." Mao Chuan: "Yue, Shuye." " About" can mean a rope. "The Eleventh Year of Zuo Zhuan-Ai Gong": "People seek appointments, Wu has short hair." Du's note: "Years, ropes. Eight feet is seeking." " Contract" can also mean restraint and check. "The Analects of Confucius-Yong Ye": "A gentleman is versed in literature, and he makes an appointment with courtesy." " About" can also mean obstruction. "Warring States Policy-Yan Policy II": "Qin called King Yan, King Yan wanted to go. King Su Daiyue Yan... King Yan Zhao couldn't do it." " About" can also mean reduction and simplicity. "Grandson: Virtual Reality": "If you can fight against the widows with the crowd, then I will have an appointment with the warriors." Du Mu's note: "Agreement, there are still few." " About" can mean simple. "Guanzi·Huangong Questions": "Everything is easy to follow by appointment, but it is easy to meet if you want to be few." " About" also refers to invitation. "Mencius·Guo Zixia": "I can make an appointment for the king and the country, and fight against it." " About" also refers to estimation. Tang Bai Juyi "Self-titled Xiaocao Ting": "The amount of green glutinous rice can be consumed in a cup, and the red rice is about to rise in cooking." " About" also refers to approximately. 約

Значения

Приблизительно; обещать, договариваться, сокращать; сокращать, экономить; сокращать, соглашение, вязывать себя, клятва

Мнемоника

  • Клятвенное соглашение, сдерживающее аппетиты обеих сторон, как бы держа их ложки 勺 на привязи 糸.

  • "Отрежьте приблизительную длину нитки 糸."

Варианты

约

Radicals: 糸, 勺  (thread, pool)
Meaning Mnemonic
You tie a thread on your finger before jumping in the pool to remind yourself of the promise you made to your mother. The thread represents the promise you made to mow the lawn after you finished swimming in the pool.
The promise reminding thread on your finger was tied too tight. You can feel the thread starting to cut off your circulation as your finger starts to turn purple and go numb. It’s really uncomfortable.
Reading Mnemonic
After you get out of the pool, you keep the promise you made to your mother. So you get on your yak (やく) powered mower and trim the grass. Yes, your mower is pulled by a yak. It’s very efficient.
Imagine yourself sitting on a riding mower as you’re pulled around the yard by a yak. The yak is having a hard time pulling you so its making lots of yak noises. Hear them in your mind.
